程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

类 RamProvisioner

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.RamProvisioner
直接已知子类:
RamProvisionerSimple
public abstract class RamProvisioner
extends java.lang.Object
RamProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy used by a host to allocate memory to virtual machines inside it. Each host has to have its own instance of a RamProvisioner. When extending this class, care must be taken to guarantee that the field availableMemory will always contain the amount of free memory available for future allocations.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

    • RamProvisioner

      public RamProvisioner​(int ram)
      Creates the new RamProvisioner.
      参数:
      ram - The total ram capacity from the host that the provisioner can allocate to VMs.

  • 方法详细资料

    • allocateRamForVm

      public abstract boolean allocateRamForVm​(Vm vm, int ram)
      Allocates RAM for a given VM.
      参数:
      vm - the virtual machine for which the RAM is being allocated
      ram - the RAM to be allocated to the VM
      返回:
      $true if the RAM could be allocated; $false otherwise

    • getAllocatedRamForVm

      public abstract int getAllocatedRamForVm​(Vm vm)
      Gets the allocated RAM for a given VM.
      参数:
      vm - the VM
      返回:
      the allocated RAM for the vm

    • deallocateRamForVm

      public abstract void deallocateRamForVm​(Vm vm)
      Releases RAM used by a VM.
      参数:
      vm - the vm

    • deallocateRamForAllVms

      public void deallocateRamForAllVms()
      Releases RAM used by all VMs.

    • isSuitableForVm

      public abstract boolean isSuitableForVm​(Vm vm, int ram)
      Checks if it is possible to change the current allocated RAM for the VM to a new amount, depending on the available RAM.
      参数:
      vm - the vm to check if there is enough available RAM on the host to change the VM allocated RAM
      ram - the new total amount of RAM for the VM.
      返回:
      true, if is suitable for vm
